name: A Thousand Lifetimes
description: A routine mission to Trill shatters when the USS Cochrane is hijacked and the Deep Space Nine members traveling aboard are forced to take on the consciousnesses of former Dax hosts. But could a key member of the Federation be responsible?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Ship Battles in one Phase, and Supply Missions in another Phase.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Joran Sisko, any version of Bashir, Dax, Adira, or Trill crew will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the Ni'Var, the U.S.S. Cochrane, or the Val Jean will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2!
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Joran Sisko, Bashir, Dax, Adira, or Trill
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Quark
featured_crew.flavor: Quark became a reluctant host to Audrid and his trepidation only increased when he found his personality at odds with hers.

action.name: The Entity That Lent Me This Body Wishes to Speak

featured_crew.name: V. Dax
featured_crew.flavor: Verad wanted to be joined so desperately that he could not accept the Commission's refusal and decided to steal Dax from Jadzia.

action.name: I Don't Want Your Advice. I Want To Be Awake.

featured_crew.name: Adira
featured_crew.flavor: Struggling with the loss and nuances of their joining, Adira practices the Cello as a way of connecting with Gray

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Pav
rewards.flavor: The leader of the Trill government, Pav was conflicted about Adira’s joining with Tal.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

ship.name: Val Jean
ship.flavor: A Maquis raider commanded by Chakotay. This vessel was destroyed after colliding with the Caretaker's array.

ship.name: Ni'Var
ship.flavor: The Ni'Var was sent by Vulcan High Command to transfer Subcommander T'Pol after her involvement in the destruction of the Vulcan Monastery on P'Jem.

ship.name: U.S.S. Cochrane
ship.flavor: With a history of transporting some of Starfleet’s finest, the U.S.S. Cochrane was put to the test battling in the Dominion War.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Quark
rewards.flavor: Quark became a reluctant host to Audrid and his trepidation only increased when he found his personality at odds with hers.

action.name: The Entity That Lent Me This Body Wishes to Speak

rewards.name: Adira
rewards.flavor: Struggling with the loss and nuances of their joining, Adira practices the Cello as a way of connecting with Gray

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

rewards.name: Adira
rewards.flavor: Struggling with the loss and nuances of their joining, Adira practices the Cello as a way of connecting with Gray

rewards.name: V. Dax
rewards.flavor: Verad wanted to be joined so desperately that he could not accept the Commission's refusal and decided to steal Dax from Jadzia.

action.name: I Don't Want Your Advice. I Want To Be Awake.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "Thanks for the quick response, Captain. I don't know how much time I have. The Cochrane was taking us to Trill, but we've been boarded by a crew from a ship with a disguised signal. They've been trying to lock us out of the computer and--""
"And have been rather successful, I assure you. Hello Torias, and Julian, of course. Captain, I don't believe anyone will be requiring your assistance here. We already have all we need."
"Of course, we wouldn't have had to take such drastic actions if our demands had been heeded. But you can ask your superiors about that one."

"Captain, can you hear me? I don't know what all that about demands and superiors is about, but they took Jadzia Dax away. Said something about plans for the Dax symbiont. I don't know what that means, but we need back-up, now!"
